name: iM1A2 Abrams: America's Main Battle Tank
name_original: iM1A2 Abrams: America's Main Battle Tank
description:
iM1A2 Abrams: America's Main Battle Tank is a simulation game developed by Charybdis. It was originally released in 1997. It was published by Interactive Magic.
You can play iM1A2 Abrams: America's Main Battle Tank on PC.
